attributes.action: abolish the green belt and build 10,000s of new houses to accomodate the influx of migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the green belt is only for the priveleged few. What about the british kids who cant leave home because there is nowhere affordable to live. Now we have 1000s of immigrant workers turning up looking for somewhere to live thus forcing the price of rented accomodation even higher
